response.job_title: Data Architect / SME L4 / Tech Manager at Globant
response.summary: Ph.D., M.Sc., and B.Eng in Systems and Computing Engineering with more than five years of experience in software development and data analytics. A problem-solver, proactive, persistent, and goal-oriented person. A computer enthusiast who enjoys his work and seeks to generate a positive impact. Someone with a high willingness to face new challenges, exceptional capacity for learning and reasoning (IQ 134), and relevant experience in leading multi-functional work teams.
response.skills: Software Architecture, Software Project Management, Machine Learning, Software Engineering, Cross-functional Team Leadership, Data science, Data Analysis, Project Planning, Cryptography, Cloud Computing, Linux System Administration, Java EE, Software Development, R, Python, Web Services, SOAP, RESTful WebServices, Hadoop

profile_positions.description:
• Lead a multicultural and multifunctional team (+80 Globers) technically.
• Design innovative and scalable platforms and data pipelines.
profile_positions.title: Data Architect / SME L4 / Tech Manager

profile_positions.description:
• Designed and implemented business software solutions based on the use of data, for decision making and business process management.
• Developed Machine Learning (ML) models, and data visualizations (offline or in real-time) on dashboards and reports.
• Designed data warehouses and carried out the corresponding data integration from all types of sources (structured and unstructured).
profile_positions.title: Founder / Full-Stack Developer / Data Scientist

profile_positions.description: Lectured the undergraduate courses: "Data Structures - [2018-1S]", "Data Structures - [2018-2S]", "Computer Programming - [2018-2S]" and "Cryptography and information security - [2018-2S]".
profile_positions.title: Lecturer

profile_positions.description:
• Designed and developed new features in the National Student Enrollment System (SIMAT) and in the National System for Monitoring and Prevention of School Dropout (SIMPADE) of the Ministry of Education of Colombia. These critical systems serve approximately 10,000 concurrent users per day.
• Optimized and tuned the performance of the systems. Example: I reduced SIMPADE response times from more than 5 minutes to less than 10 seconds.
profile_positions.title: Full-Stack Developer

profile_positions.description:
• Designed and developed a human resources and knowledge management system for the Secretary of Finance of the State of Maranhão (Brazil).
• When I was hired, the project was already delayed for more than 2 months, according to the project schedule. I redesigned some critical software components, which allowed us to finish the project successfully on time.
profile_positions.title: Software Architect

profile_positions.description: Lectured the undergraduate courses: "Visual Computing - [2016-1S]", "Visual Computing - [2016-2S]" and "Data Structures [2016-2S]".
profile_positions.title: Lecturer

profile_positions.description:
• Designed and implemented a framework to develop georeferenced information systems for the Internet of Things (IoT).
• Applied the framework to develop a surveillance and control system of radio spectrum in Colombia, for the National Spectrum Agency of Colombia (ANE).
• Supported the design and implementation of a platform for intelligent vehicle control within a research project of the Colombian Administrative Department of Science, Technology and Innovation (Colciencias).
profile_positions.title: Software developer

company.name: Globant
company.description:
We are a digitally native company that helps organizations reinvent themselves to create a way forward and unleash their potential. We are the place where innovation, design and engineering meet scale.

- We have more than 27,000 employees and we are present in 25 countries working for companies like Google, Rockwell Automation, Electronic Arts and Santander, among others.

- We were also featured as a business case study at Harvard, MIT, and Stanford.

- We were named a Worldwide Leader in CX Improvement Services by IDC MarketScape report.

- We are a member of the Cybersecurity Tech Accord.

- At Globant, we believe that an inclusive culture and a diverse environment make us stronger. We are an equal opportunity employer (EOE M/F/D/V), always seeking to generate a place for inspiration and growth for everyone regardless of race, color, religion, national origin, sexual orientation, age, marital status, disability, gender identity, or veteran status.

- Our ultimate Diversity & Inclusion goal is to make Globant a respectful, safe, and inclusive workplace for all Globers where gender equality, cultural diversity, and inclusion are core to our DNA. 


For more information, visit https://bit.ly/globant_com
